moves.title: Forward Air
changes: Hitboxes can now clank against projectiles

moves.title: Neutral Special (Thunder Punch)
changes: B-reversing neutral special near the ledge will now allow you to drop to ledge, as in 3.6

moves.title: Other
changes: Short hop lasts for one more frame

moves.title: Up Smash
changes: First 2 frames of second hit (ID 0 hitbox) now send in front of Diddy to promote better linking

moves.title: Up Special (Rocketbarrel Boost)
changes: Barrel explosions no longer clank

moves.title: Cargo Throw
changes: Damage Scaling hold time 0.592 > 2.5

moves.title: Inhale
changes: Mash requirement to escape 150 > 200

moves.title: Jab Combo
changes: Given slightly more range to link more reliably
Jab 1 KB stats revised. Now can true jab reset most characters until around 50%.

moves.title: Up Tilt
changes: Late active frames reduced by 1

moves.title: Forward Smash
changes: Angle 30 > 40
Startup 26 > 23

moves.title: Up Smash
changes: Late hit: Damage 14 > 13, BKB 40 > 30

moves.title: Down Smash
changes: End Lag 9 > 13

moves.title: Forward Air
changes: EEEEYAH! SFX now plays 75% of the time instead of 100%
Said SFX will now terminate properly if hit out of the move

moves.title: Back Air
changes: Fixed an error where the 2nd hitbox on the sweet spot had 0 BKB instead of 21. Sour spot hitboxes BKB normalized from 20/0 > 10/10
Strong hit active frames 2 > 3

moves.title: Grab
changes: Fixed a dead zone on standing and dash grab
Animation adjusted to better match grab range on standing and dash grab

moves.title: Neutral Special (Dig/Drill Claw)
changes: Knuckles is now completely invincible while underground
Leg intangibility added for 2 frames as he comes out of the ground
Large Uppercut body hitbox now split into 2 hitboxes and no longer hit below stage
Drill Claw hitboxes when passing through a platform no longer clank
No longer has the bury effect on opponents standing on solid ground

moves.title: Side Special (Dive Punch)
changes: Grounded version now accelerates slightly faster to the apex
Aerial version now maintains most of its momentum if done out of glide
Can now be done during glide startup (press grab during glide, will not consume glide if done out of startup)
Fixed a bug where Glide was consumed if hit out of grounded Dive Punch

moves.title: Side Special (Glide)
changes: Glide timer 80 frames > 70 frames
Turning reduces timer 15 frames > 10 frames
Glide no longer returned if Knuckles wall clings
Fixed a bug where glide would not be returned if knuckles got hit during glide landing animation
Fixed a bug where Knuckles would not wall cling at certain points on Final Destination and some other stages
Graphic added to signify when a glide is considered used

moves.title: Down Special (Spin Dash)
changes: Fixed a error where there would be a 0% hitbox if done from the air
Red overlay on cancel removed
Cancel endlag 17 > 20

moves.title: Up Special (Spring Jump)
changes: Now has increased horizontal air control
Spring lifetime on ground 8 seconds > 5 seconds

moves.title: Other
changes: Item Toss strength 1.6 > 1
Fixed a bug where shield spawned at his feet during empty landing lag and all crouch animations
Fixed a bug where ledge jump above 100% did not work on the right side of Yoshi’s Story

changes.title: Can no longer be ASDI’d down, but can still be true crouch cancelled
changes: SDI multiplier 1x > .75x

moves.title: Other
changes: Up B directional properties reverted to v1.05b
Releasing Aura Sphere now requires a double tap of the B button

moves.title: Down Smash
changes: Sourspot size 8.56 > 6.86
Sweetspot size 5 > 4.7
Active frames 4-18 > 4-14

moves.title: Other
changes: Mewtwo’s tail has been given a facelift on all skins to have a higher polycount. This also applies to the Mewtwo trophy

moves.title: Other
changes: Aerial footstooled animation now places opponents above ROB rather than to the side

moves.title: Forward Smash
changes: Startup reverted to 3.6 (first active frame 10 > 11), additional active frame added at the end
Sword hitbox placement now matches Marth fsmash

moves.title: Neutral Special
changes: Easter egg SFX timing moved back 10 frames, sword trail polished (new in 2.11)

moves.title: Down Special (Transform)
changes: Transform time 49 frames > 55 frames

moves.title: Other
changes: Tech rolls modified to be slightly easier to react to

moves.title: Other
changes: Eye and face animation changes made to aerials, down smash, and the trick actions Sonic performs on connecting with Homing Attack, to make him more lively

moves.title: Other
changes: Reverted down tilt and all aerial animations to PM 3.6
Updated crouch and forward smash charge animations to be more consistent with past animations

moves.title: Down Special (Transform)
changes: Transform time 62 frames > 55 frames

moves.title: Final Destination
changes: New L+R-alt: Color-Changing Melee FD

moves.title: Battlefield
changes: Z-alt: Now uses its own tracklist so that there are less Brawl themes on the default one

moves.title: Bell Tower
changes: Adjusted blast zones to be more intuitive, visually
Z-alt: Added left ledge to the rightmost platform

moves.title: Dead Line
changes: Regular and GHZ alts updated, new model for the base of the stage and visuals in the background

moves.title: Delfino’s Secret
changes: Layouts reverted to PMBR two-phase version, including all 1:1 alts
Adjusted palette of foreground and background

moves.title: Golden Temple
changes: Raised top and bottom blast zone heights

moves.title: Kongo Jungle
changes: Start positions and item spawn points normalized. This also applies to skins based on this layout

moves.title: Mario Circuit
changes: Z-alt: Rainbow Road collisions and shaping adjusted to avoid clipping through the stage and give more room to fight near the bottom

moves.title: Metroid Lab
changes: Raised top blast zone height 155 > 170

moves.title: Green Hill Zone
changes: New Z-alt: Radical Highway, a 1:1 of Green Hill Zone (optimized in 2.11)

moves.title: Sky Sanctuary Zone
changes: Spawn points for Players 1 and 2 moved slightly to be outside of striking distance

moves.title: Yoshi’s Story
changes: Lower blastzone lowered -91 > -94 to allow Sonic and Mr. Game and Watch to sweetspot from below
New Z-alt: Yoshi’s Cookie! Features custom food item models reminiscent of the cookies from the eponymous title (camera edited in 2.11)

moves.title: Characters
changes: ECB during hitstun restored to 3.6 behavior
Kirby’s jumps restored to proper values
Kirby no longer holds Galaxia forever after using MK’s tornado
Kirby’s Drill Claw hitboxes now match Knuckles'
Multiple Kirby hat GFX now linger and/or despawn properly
Zelda can no longer disappear when Up B is interrupted
Zelda’s Din’s Fire now works as intended
Zelda telecancel behavior restored to 3.6
Transformed Sheik/Zelda lightpresses now work again
Ganondorf third grab hitbox that was unintentionally missing restored
Pikachu’s Quick Attack Cancel now matches 3.6
ROB’s Up Special momentum now matches 3.6
Bowser no longer has a longer unintended DACUS length
Charizard’s up throw no longer breaks when used with the C-Stick
Lucas Down Smash second hit can now be buffered properly
Misc Mewtwo SFX errors corrected
Ivysaur now heals every time when sweetspotting bulb moves
Samus can now always crawl out of Down B
ZSS no longer has insane drift after charging up smash
Nana can no longer be ledgetrumped
Sonic’s Down Tilt now has fixed foot animations
Wario-Man no longer goes to center stage when thrown and has a third double jump again
Bugs with multiple hidden alts fixed (2.11)

moves.title: Stages/Music
changes: Dream Land’s Y alt now loads properly
Metal Cavern’s Z + Y alt now loads properly
Metal Cavern no longer messes up tethers on the left side
Alt Stages toggle in the Code Menu now functions
Ridley Land duplicate collision on left platform removed
Solid objects on Rainbow Road can no longer be entered
Platforms on Delfino’s Secret 1:1s now display properly on console
Pinch themes are now properly implemented, as their functionality was not active in 2.0
Opening Menu (Metroid Prime) now plays correctly on Norfair’s Z-alt
Bike Theme (Pokémon Diamond & Pearl) now plays correctly on Saffron City’s Z-alt
More songs included on various stages. See the music lineup for more information on what is new in 2.1
Music tracklists can now exceed 15 songs
Track naming errors fixed on P+ Stadium and other stages

moves.title: Other
changes: Attack Stick can now input jab/nair, but cannot do angled tilts
New Tilt Stick option added that functions as P+ 2.0 Attack Stick (angled tilts, no jab/nair)
CSS controls config no longer breaks when another player is moving their cursor
Characters no longer suffer model seizing after teching Zero Suit Samus’ Down Smash
Multiple Pokemon and co-op edge case crashes in SSE fixed
Spawning three CPUs in Training Mode no longer crashes
Trip armour on throws now always works
Spawning the Mr. Resetti Assist Trophy no longer crashes the game
Multiple character alts now appear properly darkened on Sunset Shore
Co-op event stage loader now matches 1P events
Fixed crash related to a co-op event on the hardest difficulty
Meta Knight, Fox, and Falco AI updated to be more realistic, less oppressive and smarter
Nunchuck stick usage restored to Brawl behavior
Strap Screen now loads properly in other languages
Stage loading re-written to prevent file loading softlocks, especially on console
Stage Striking now always properly detects stage changes
Non-VS mode times (BTT, Boss Rush, etc) now show in frames like the VS mode timer

moves.title: Characters/Costumes
changes: Kirby’s Ganondorf hat’s GFX revamped
Falco’s Z alt has been replaced
ZSS ponytail skins now have fixed hair
Tan and Mango DK skins now have proper skin tones
Knuckles’ Espio, Jet Set, and Z alt costumes now have proper metals
Knuckles’ costumes now have final smash eyes
Paralyze shaking reduced in movement intensity

moves.title: Stages
changes: Pumpkin Hill alt on Sky Sanctuary Zone swapped out for a more game-accurate version
Castle Siege no longer has blocks on the front corners to reduce obscurement
P+ Stadium now has confetti effects from Subspace
World Bowser has been optimized and more content added to the background
Abandoned Stadium graphics updated
Various quality updates made to lighting and shader settings to various alt stages
Materials errors fixed on Waluigi Stadium and Rainbow Road

moves.title: Other
changes: Legacy TE graphics in Group Records and on the Title Screen replaced
Mewtwo HD texture issues fixed
Ivysaur’s renders now line up properly
HD textures now in DDS format; full-quality PNG versions included in the Modder’s Pack
480p Pixel Fix included for console versions
Strap and Results screen updated for version 2.1
